reviews.reviewText: Coffee carafe was just what I ended. Works well and I'm very happy with it.
reviews.title: Very Happy With Purchase

It is fit in my coffee maker 10 cups.
I am very satisfied and I' m going to buy again

reviews.title: Universal coffee carafe

reviews.name: One All Universal 10-Cup Eurostyle Glass Replacement Carafe, Black
reviews.reviewText: I would highly recommend this replacement carafe. It fits my old Braun coffee maker perfectly.
reviews.title: Highly Recommend

reviews.name: One All Universal 10-Cup Eurostyle Glass Replacement Carafe, Black
reviews.reviewText: I bought my Braun coffee maker about 15 years ago. One of the last few made in Europe. I careless broke the carafe. Looked all over for a replacement. Saw some used ones on eBay for a ridiculous price. By sheer accident, I found this universal replacement at Walmart's website. Saved my beloved coffee maker. Shipped to my local Walmart Express. Great price too
reviews.title: Saved My Coffee Maker
